Prebon was evily happy (If that makes sense.) He was now unit commander of =
the Drackotrons and Shivah didn't seem to mind handing them over to him. "L=
et me check the information in my quarters and We'll begin training in the =
morning." You'd better get some rest, I will not tolerate slackers in my un=
it." He stepped closer, stood straight up and got within a foot of Shivahs =
face, "AND FROM HERE ON OUT YOU WILL REFER TO ME BY MY RANK OF TRAINER, AND=
 WILL ANSWER TO YOUR NEW TITLE OF GRUNT, IS THAT UNDERSTOOD GRUNT!!!" It wa=
s a bold move but he had to be sure that they both knew that he wasn't goin=
g to be light on her.

<DIV><FONT face=3DArial size=3D2>Prebon =
was evily happy (If that makes sense.) He 
was now unit commander of the Dr=
ackotrons and Shivah didn't seem to mind handing 
them over to him. "Let me=
 check the information in my quarters and We'll begin 
training in the morn=
ing." You'd better get some rest, I will not tolerate 
slackers in my unit.=
" He stepped closer, stood straight up and got within a foot 
of Shivahs fa=
ce, "AND FROM HERE ON OUT YOU WILL REFER TO ME BY MY RANK OF 
TRAINER, AND =
WILL ANSWER TO YOUR NEW TITLE OF GRUNT, IS THAT UNDERSTOOD 
GRUNT!!!" It wa=
s a bold move but he had to be sure that they both knew that he 
wasn't goi=
ng to be light on her.</FONT></DIV>
